holidays.title: Monkey Day
holidays.description: We shouldn’t forget that we share a common ancestor with chimpanzees!

holidays.title: Halcyon Days
holidays.description: Indulge in some sweet remembrance today. Here are some ways to turn back the clock.

holidays.title: Martyred Intellectuals Day
holidays.description: Honor their lives and memory today — read, share, and amplify the stories of Bangladesh’s martyred intellectuals.

holidays.title: More Good Today Day
holidays.description: More Good Today Day is observed every year to encourage kindness and generosity.

holidays.title: National Alabama Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Alabama the Beautiful today and remember what makes it so special!

holidays.title: National Bouillabaisse Day
holidays.description: Bon appétit! Bouillabaisse traces its roots all the way back to ancient Greece.

holidays.title: National Energy Conservation Day
holidays.description: The day is organized by India's Bureau of Energy Efficiency.

holidays.title: Roast Chestnuts Day
holidays.description: When they are roasted, the natural sweetness of the nut is revealed, delighting our taste buds!

holidays.title: Alex Gaskarth’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock singer is one of the best to have done it in the music industry.

holidays.title: Benjamin Haggard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Benjamin Haggard has forged his own sound and is one of the most successful country musicians.

holidays.title: Candiace Dillard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite her involvement in controversies, this reality star still keeps us glued to our screens.

holidays.title: Ciel Star’s Birthday
holidays.description: His social media accounts already featured the name Ciel, reflecting his immersion in the persona.

holidays.title: George VI’s Birthday
holidays.description: He rose to become the finest monarch, loved and respected by his people.

holidays.title: James Comey’s Birthday
holidays.description: Comey went to the University of Chicago Law School where he received a law degree.

holidays.title: Kate Bogucharskaia’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her trip to Moscow opened her eyes to a world she never knew existed.

holidays.title: Lisa Barlow’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star is self-made, self-reliant, and proud of her career accomplishments.

holidays.title: Mason Disick’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his early exposure to the glitz of Hollywood, we’d love to see him soar.

holidays.title: Mike Fuentes’s Birthday
holidays.description: From emo rock to experimental rap, Mike Fuentes isn’t afraid to let his talent shine!

holidays.title: Nostradamus’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the seer Nostradamus, whose quatrains have attracted a cult following over the centuries.

holidays.title: Offset’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous rapper has made huge waves in the hip-hop and rap communities.

holidays.title: Reign Disick’s Birthday
holidays.description: Little Reign Disick seems to have come into the world with the power of a monarch.

holidays.title: Ryland Storms’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has taken the social media world by storm with his amazing content!

holidays.title: Vanessa Hudgens’s Birthday
holidays.description: This pop singer has made waves across Hollywood since her film debut, and she’s not stopping.
